CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.Name, 'MyCase', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Subdomain__c)), HYPERLINK("https://" & Subdomain__c & ".mycase.com/admin/firm", "MyCase Admin Portal Link"), "MyCase Not Available" ), 'LawPay Pro', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Subdomain__c)), HYPERLINK("https://" & Subdomain__c & ".mycase.com/admin/firm", "LawPay Pro Admin Portal Link"), "LawPay Pro Link Not Available" ), 'Affinipay', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(VTID__c)), HYPERLINK("https://secure.affinipay.com/admin/merchants/" & VTID__c, "VT Account Record Link"), "VT Record Link Not Available" ), 'Docketwise', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Owners_Email__c)), HYPERLINK("https://app.docketwise.com/admin/subscribers?filter=all&search=" & Owners_Email__c, "Docketwise Account Search"), "Docketwise Search Not Available" ), "Brand Not Supported Yet" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Renders a link to the MyCase Admin Portal or LawPay Pro Admin Portal based on the subdomain derived identified on the product environment record
CustomField.label: Admin Portal
